name: imagecondom
description: Image condom is an on-the-fly proxy server for images. It can be used for when you want to resize an image without having to resize it.

scripts.update: npm outdated --depth=0 | grep -v Package | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -I% npm install %@latest --save

author: Mike Timofiiv (http://fiiv.io)
